{"id":1139101515,"question_id":3270,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8Â months, 3Â weeks","timestamp":1704596824,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1139101515/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Moves to Capture The Queen","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minMovesToCaptureTheQueen(int a, int b, int c, int d, int e, int f) {\n        int ans=0;\n        if(a==e){\n            if(c>a and e>c){\n            ans=1;}\n            else{\n                ans=2;\n            }\n        }\n        if(b==f){\n            if(d>b and f>d){\n                ans=1;\n            }\n            else{\n                ans=2;\n            }\n        }\n        else if(a!=e and b!=f){\n            ans=2;\n        }\n        if(c-d==e-f or c+d==e+f){\n            if(c-d!=a-b and c+d!=a+b){\n            ans=min(ans,1);}\n            else{\n                if(a<c and b<e){\n                ans=min(ans,2);}\n                else{\n                    ans=min(ans,1);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        else if(c-d!=e-f and c+d!=e+f){\n            ans=min(ans,2);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-moves-to-capture-the-queen","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
